title: Retrieve Omeluum
content:
Retrieve Omeluum Type Quest Act Act 3 Location The Lodge Reward Wizardsbane OilFungal BamboozlerScroll of Dimension DoorScroll of SunbeamPotion of Supreme Healing

Retrieve Omeluum

Retrieve Omeluum is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Retrieve Omeluum can be acquired during Act 3. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Retrieve Omeluum Objectives
